intro: Turn off the lights, dodge the ghosts and go to sleep as soon as you can in this hand-crafted 2d platformer!
description:
Desvelado is the first Bed-Time-Vania game in history! Help our hero Vampy fight insomnia one last time by turning off every light in the castle before going to sleep in his cozy coffin.

• Immortal gameplay: Classic 2D platformer mechanics.
• Sharp controller: Slide, jump and dash to move swiftly.
• Challenging puzzles and multiple enemies to overcome
• Bloody animations: Enjoy a unique visual style, with hand-crafted animations.
• Vampiric music to get in the mood.
• 100+ Rooms to solve.
• 3 Main zones: The Castle, the Dungeon, and the Catacombs.
• 3 Final levels: What you learned in each area will be put to the test.
• Bonus Levels: Some rooms are optional, but if you'll get a reward if you manage to complete them all!
